scripts.deploy-prod: CI=false REACT_APP_GOAL_URL=https://outbreaklibrary.org REACT_APP_ENV_NAME=prod REACT_APP_METRICS_API_URL=https://metric-api-test.talusanalytics.com REACT_APP_AMP_METRICS_API_URL=https://metric-api-test.talusanalytics.com REACT_APP_API_URL=https://ghs-tracking-api-prod.ghscosting.org yarn build && aws s3 sync build/ s3://ghs-tracking-prod  --acl public-read --delete
scripts.deploy-dev: CI=false REACT_APP_GOAL_URL=https://goal2.ghscosting.org REACT_APP_ENV_NAME=dev REACT_APP_METRICS_API_URL=https://metric-api-test.talusanalytics.com REACT_APP_AMP_METRICS_API_URL=https://metric-api-test.talusanalytics.com REACT_APP_API_URL=https://ghs-tracking-api-dev3.ghscosting.org yarn build && aws s3 sync build/ s3://ghs-tracking-dev  --acl public-read --delete
scripts.deploy-dev2: CI=false REACT_APP_GOAL_URL=https://goal2.ghscosting.org REACT_APP_ENV_NAME=dev REACT_APP_METRICS_API_URL=https://metric-api-test.talusanalytics.com REACT_APP_AMP_METRICS_API_URL=https://metric-api-test.talusanalytics.com REACT_APP_API_URL=https://ghs-tracking-api-dev2.ghscosting.org yarn build && aws s3 sync build/ s3://ghs-tracking-dev2  --acl public-read --delete
scripts.deploy-dev3: CI=false REACT_APP_GOAL_URL=https://goal2.ghscosting.org REACT_APP_ENV_NAME=dev REACT_APP_METRICS_API_URL=https://metric-api-test.talusanalytics.com REACT_APP_AMP_METRICS_API_URL=https://metric-api-test.talusanalytics.com REACT_APP_API_URL=https://ghs-tracking-api-dev3.ghscosting.org yarn build && aws s3 sync build/ s3://ghs-tracking-dev3  --acl public-read --delete
